Articles.Content:
Hey Kerbalnaughts! I have a little suggestion.

Why not add Aurora into the game for the north and south poles of Kerbin along with some other celestial bodies. It would also be a great way to gain science.

They'd be a common aspect of the game which happen every 2-3 days which will make it hard to predict when they next occur. A new scientific equipment could allow the measurements of the Aurora and send back data to the Kerbals on the ground and gain SCIENCE! (*cheers*)

Along with them adding Science it could also allow for better screenshots and more visuals to look at while in the game. Imagine making a space station and flying over the aurora down below. It would be truly amazing.

A side note from this would be changing some aspects of the sun for example Solar Flares and Randomised Sun Spots!
Adding auroras would mean solar flares should also be added, and I doubt they are going to do that, but besides that, I like the idea!
